#summary The input element represents an interactive control in a form.
#labels about-html,about-forms,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *input element*

The `input` element's behavior is entirely dependent on its `type` attribute.

  * [InputTypeButtonElement input type="button"]
  * [InputTypeCheckboxElement input type="checkbox"]
  * [InputTypeFileElement input type="file"]
  * [InputTypeHiddenElement input type="hidden"]
  * [InputTypeImageElement input type="image"]
  * [InputTypePasswordElement input type="password"]
  * [InputTypeRadioElement input type="radio"]
  * [InputTypeReadonlyElement input type="readonly"]
  * [InputTypeResetElement input type="reset"]
  * [InputTypeSubmitElement input type="submit"]
  * [InputTypeTextElement input type="text"]
